H0.text: Which river rises in Huyton and meets the coast at Hightown. Mersey

H1.text: Which river rises in Huyton and meets the coast at Hightown. Dee

H2.text: Which river rises in Huyton and meets the coast at Hightown. Ribble

H3.text: Which river rises in Huyton and meets the coast at Hightown. Alt

A4.text: The River Mersey is currently regarded as starting at the confluence of the River Tame and River Goyt in the centre of Stockport.
